QuestData.Title: Forming the Scroll
QuestData.Description: We'll need arcane parchment to make the scroll.$B$BThe arcane energy everywhere at this nexus froze the ancients in place and settled in their bark.$B$BIf we take pieces from the few that haven't been destroyed by the fungal creatures, I can mold them into parchment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rip $1oa Pieces of Bark off of Slumbering Ancients in Zangarra.
